src:
Cedera, Victor Lindelof Dipastikan Absen Lawan Partizan Belgrade
07 Nov 2019, 15:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer membeberkan kondisi timnya jelang melawan Partizan Belgrade dini hari nanti. Solskjaer memastikan Victor Lindelof akan absen di laga tersebut.
Manchester United akan melanjutkan perjalanan mereka di Liga Europa dini hari nanti. Mereka akan menjamu Partizan Belgrade di Old Trafford.
Pertandingan ini cukup krusial bagi United. Jika mereka memenangkan laga ini, peluang mereka memastikan diri lolos ke babak knockout Liga Europa akan semakin terbuka lebar.
Namun Solskjaer mengonfirmasi bahwa ia tidak bisa menurunkan komposisi tim terbaiknya di laga ini. "Victor [Lindelof] tidak bisa bermain besok, semoga saja ia bisa bermain di akhir pekan nanti namun saya masih belum bisa memastikan," ujar Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap pelatih asal Norwegia itu di bawah ini.
text:
Injury, Victor Lindelof Confirmed Absent Opponent Partizan Belgrade
Nov 7 2019, 15:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer revealed the condition of his team ahead of Partizan Belgrade in the early hours of the morning. Solskjaer ensured Victor Lindelof would miss the match.
Manchester United will continue their journey in the Europa League in the morning. They will host Partizan Belgrade at Old Trafford.
This match is quite crucial for United. If they win this fight, their chances of making sure they qualify for the Europa League knockout round will be wide open.
But Solskjaer confirmed that he could not reduce the composition of his best team in this fight. "Victor [Lindelof] can't play tomorrow, hopefully he can play at the end of the weekend but I'm still not sure," Solskjaer told MUTV.

Read the full comments of the Norwegian trainer below.
